app.title: Chaos Zero Nightmare Deck Editor
app.description: A tool to freely edit your deck

darkSword.name: Dark Sword
darkSword.description: A sword imbued with dark power

dialos_3.name: Ally Empower
dialos_3.additionalEffect: Applies the effect to all allies

descriptions.0: Deal fire damage to single enemy
descriptions.1: Deal fire damage to single enemy (minor power increase)
descriptions.2: Deal fire damage to single enemy (power increase)
descriptions.3: Deal heavy fire damage to single enemy
descriptions.4: Deal heavy fire damage to single enemy (power increase)
descriptions.5: Deal massive fire damage to single enemy

descriptions.0: Deal powerful fire damage to single enemy
descriptions.1: Deal powerful fire damage to single enemy (minor power increase)
descriptions.2: Deal powerful fire damage to single enemy (power increase)
descriptions.3: Deal super powerful fire damage to single enemy
descriptions.4: Deal super powerful fire damage to single enemy (power increase)
descriptions.5: Deal extreme fire damage to single enemy

descriptions.0: Defend with ice shield and damage attacker
descriptions.1: Defend with ice shield and damage attacker (minor power increase)
descriptions.2: Defend with ice shield and deal high damage to attacker
descriptions.3: Defend with ice shield and deal high damage + freeze to attacker
descriptions.4: Perfect defense with ice shield and deal massive damage + freeze to attacker
descriptions.5: Perfect defense with ice shield and deal extreme damage to attacker

descriptions.1: Restore HP of single ally (minor healing increase)
descriptions.2: Restore HP of single ally (healing increase)
descriptions.4: Greatly restore HP of all allies
descriptions.5: Massively restore HP of all allies

descriptions.3: Greatly increase own defense + nullify damage once
descriptions.4: Massively increase own defense + nullify damage twice

descriptions.1: Summon a powerful monster to attack
descriptions.2: Summon a powerful monster for multiple attacks
descriptions.3: Summon a legendary monster for powerful attack

descriptions.0: Deal neutral damage to all enemies
descriptions.1: Deal neutral damage to all enemies (power increase)
descriptions.2: Deal heavy neutral damage to all enemies
descriptions.3: Deal massive neutral damage to all enemies

descriptions.0: Deal lightning damage to all enemies
descriptions.1: Deal lightning damage to all enemies + paralyze
descriptions.2: Deal heavy lightning damage to all enemies + paralyze + stun
descriptions.3: Deal massive lightning damage to all enemies + paralyze + stun

descriptions.0: Forbidden magic deals massive damage to enemy (with recoil)
descriptions.1: Forbidden magic deals massive damage to enemy (reduced recoil)
descriptions.2: Forbidden magic deals extreme damage to enemy (reduced recoil)
descriptions.3: Forbidden magic deals extreme damage to enemy (no recoil)
